title: Looking For  A Support And Top Laner.. "Fill" Commited/ Active.
body:
Hey, serious ranked team here looking for positive players who are looking to learn, grow and make friends as a team.
So far we have a Full Roster. So we are looking for a support and a top laner fill that are fairly active at night time and in general. 

We enjoy messing around and have banter occasionally. So not for the easily offended
Feel free to add me and lets have a chat to see if you are ready to be a new member.

Needs to be able to communicate well in discord and have a decent knowledge of the game etc.. :) 

Thanks Big Chief
IGN- Big Chief Poon

Hit me up an add and private message :)

Teram Elo-- Around High Silver, Gold!

replies.body:
Hey! 

Met you ingame and thought you were super cool (the only one in the team who was actually getting objectives done and helping me when I was struggling 1vs2 top) thus I remember your name, so just wanted to wish you good luck for your recruitment and confirm you're a positive player that anyone would have fun playing with :)
Fairly versatile support here, silver 2. No main champ, i'm alright with pretty much all of the supps. IGN: Devi3nt

Hi,

I really enjoy playing Support and Top:

Morgana (100% WR - 11 games) 
Shen (77% WR - 26 games)

Thats the only 2 champions I play, let me know :)

if you still need a top laner I'm keen. I'm g2 
In game name: 4rtificialalpha
add me if you still need
Cheers
added you, hmu if you are keen for a game tonight.

Hey Buddy Added you.. @ "Dragon Poo"
 
Didn't get your add -_- 

accept and we will have a chat on discord tomorrow.. pce mate 

Big Chief Poon
